pullRequest.title: Check for unallocated equipment in larger aerospace units during validation
pullRequest.bodyText:
Call parent method in TestAero to insure all equipment other than one-shot ammo has been assigned a location. Clean up in TestAero, including removing code that was copied from TestMech that has no bearing on aerospace units.
Fixes MegaMek/megameklab#712

commit.message:
Cleanup checks for unallocated equipment in TestAero

Removed code that was copied from TestMech but irrelevant for aeros.
Check for unallocated equipment on small craft and large craft.
Skip fixed slot limit check for non-fighter aeros.
